amendment.description: Amendment directs the Corps to calculate the national benefits of proposed flood protection projects, including benefits from a reduction in national and regional economic losses, as well as the protection of evacuation routes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Richmond amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 183 (Roll no. 559).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Richmond.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Richmond amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 183 (Roll no. 559).
